metadata.Title: CVE-2005-1513 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
Integer overflow in the stralloc_readyplus function in qmail, when runningon 64 bit platforms with a large amount of virtual memory, allows remoteattackers to cause a denial of service and possibly execute arbitrary codevia a large SMTP request.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2005-1513` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

qmail - 1.06-6.2~deb10u1build0.18.04.1
qmail-uids-gids - 1.06-6.2~deb10u1build0.18.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: netqmail package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.06-6.2~deb10u1build0.18.04.1').
